trans-unit.source: Provides functionality to split a string into text elements and to iterate through those text elements.
trans-unit.target: 提供將字串分隔為文字項目並逐一查看那些文字項目的功能。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。

trans-unit.source: A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> class enables you to work with a string as a series of textual elements rather than individual <xref:System.Char> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>類別可讓您能夠以字串為一系列的文字項目，而不是個別<xref:System.Char>物件。

trans-unit.source: To instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object that represents a specified string, you can do either of the following:
trans-unit.target: 具現化<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>物件，表示指定的字串中，您可以執行下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor and pass it the string that the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object is to represent as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式並將它傳遞為字串，<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>物件所要做為引數表示。

trans-unit.source: Call the default <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor> constructor, and assign the string that the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object is to represent to the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫預設<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor>建構函式，並將字串指派，<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>物件是代表要傳遞到<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can work with the individual text elements in a string in two ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用兩種方式的字串中的個別文字項目：

trans-unit.source: By enumerating each text element.
trans-unit.target: 列舉每個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you call the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A> method, and then repeatedly call the <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator> object until the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A>方法，然後重複呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法在傳回<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator>物件，直到該方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A> method to retrieve an array that contains the starting index of each text element.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A>方法來擷取陣列，其中包含每個文字項目的起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve individual text elements by passing these indexes to the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 接著您可以藉由傳遞至這些索引擷取個別文字項目<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates both ways of working with the text elements in a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明這兩種使用字串中的文字項目。

trans-unit.source: It creates two strings:
trans-unit.target: 它會建立兩個字串：

trans-unit.source: `strCombining`, which is a string of Arabic characters that includes three text elements with multiple <xref:System.Char> objects.
trans-unit.target: `strCombining`這是阿拉伯文字元的字串，包含三個文字項目與多個<xref:System.Char>物件。

trans-unit.source: The first text element is the base character ARABIC LETTER ALEF (U+-627) followed by ARABIC HAMZA BELOW (U+-655) and ARABIC KASRA (U+0650).
trans-unit.target: 第一個文字項目，則基底字元阿拉伯文字母引 (U +-627) 後面接著阿拉伯文 HAMZA 下方 (U +-655) 和阿拉伯文 KASRA (U + 0650)。

trans-unit.source: The second text element is ARABIC LETTER HEH (U+0647) followed by ARABIC FATHA (U+-64E).
trans-unit.target: 第二個文字項目，則阿拉伯字母嘿嘿 (U + 0647) 後面接著阿拉伯文 FATHA (U +-64E)。

trans-unit.source: The third text element is ARABIC LETTTER BEH (U+0628) followed by ARABIC DAMMATAN (U+064C).
trans-unit.target: 第三個文字項目，則阿拉伯 LETTTER 背後 (U + 0628) 後面接著阿拉伯文 DAMMATAN (U + 064 C)。

trans-unit.source: `strSurrogates`, which is a string that includes three surrogate pairs: GREEK ACROPHONIC FIVE TALENTS (U+10148) from the Supplementary Multilingual Plane, U+20026 from the Supplementary Ideographic Plane, and U+F1001 from the private user area.
trans-unit.target: `strSurrogates`這是包含三個 surrogate 字組的字串： 希臘 ACROPHONIC 五個才能 (U + 10148) 從補充多語文字面 U + 20026 補充表意平面，與 U + F1001 從私用使用者區域。

trans-unit.source: The UTF-16 encoding of each character is a surrogate pair that consists of a high surrogate followed by a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 每個字元的 utf-16 編碼方式為 surrogate 字組所組成的高 surrogate，後面接著為低 surrogate。

trans-unit.source: Each string is parsed once by the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A> method and then by the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每個字串由一次剖析<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A>方法再依據<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Both methods correctly parse the text elements in the two strings and display the results of the parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法正確剖析的兩個字串中的文字項目，並顯示在剖析作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> class to manipulate a string that contains surrogate and combining characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A>方法<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>類別來操作包含 surrogate 字及組合字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the methods of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> class call the methods of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo" /> class to determine character categories.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，方法的<see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" />類別呼叫的方法<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo" />類別以決定字元類別。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], character classification is based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0).
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，字元分類根據[Unicode Standard、 版本 8.0.0](https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0)。

trans-unit.source: For the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] through the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], it is based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]透過[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，則會根據[Unicode Standard、 版本 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object is initialized to the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 新的值<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>物件會初始化為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can assign another string to it by using the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用它來指派另一個字串<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object that represents a specified string in a single step by calling the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以執行個體化<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>物件，表示單一步驟中指定的字串，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A string to initialize this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> class to a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體 (Instance) 初始化為指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: This constructor assigns the value argument to the object's <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會將數值引數指派給物件的<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object.
trans-unit.target: 物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object and its <see cref="P:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String" /> property equals the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String" /> property of this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 參數是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件，而且其 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String" /> 屬性等於這個 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a hash code for the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 計算目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件值的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code based on the string value of this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件的字串值為基礎的 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer) 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A> is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another.
trans-unit.target: 行為<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A>相依於它的實作，可能會變更到另一個版本的 common language runtime。

trans-unit.source: This might happen to improve the performance of <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會發生以改善效能的<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To make the behavior of <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A> constant, the application should override the runtime implementation of <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A> with an implementation known to never change.
trans-unit.target: 若要使的行為<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A>常數，應用程式應該覆寫的執行階段實作<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetHashCode%2A>已知永遠不會變更的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first text element in a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定字串中的第一個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: The string from which to get the text element.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中取得文字項目的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first text element in a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定字串中的第一個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the first text element in the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定字串中第一個文字項目的字串。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。

trans-unit.source: A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: This method only returns the first text element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會傳回第一個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: To iterate through the text elements of the string, the application should use the <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator> object generated by the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要逐一查看字串的文字項目，應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator>物件所產生<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="str" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string from which to get the text element.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中取得文字項目的字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the text element starts.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目開始處的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text element at the specified index of the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定字串中指定索引處的文字項目。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the text element at the specified index of the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定字串中指定索引處的文字項目的字串。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。

trans-unit.source: A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: This method only returns the first text element of the substring that starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會傳回指定索引處開始的子字串的第一個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: To iterate through the text elements of the string, the application should use the <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator> generated by the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要逐一查看字串的文字項目，應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator>所產生<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="str" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="str" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 超出 <paramref name="str" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the text elements of a string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以逐一查看字串文字項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The string to iterate through.
trans-unit.target: 要逐一查看的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the text elements of the entire string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以逐一查看整個字串文字項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator" /> for the entire string.
trans-unit.target: 整個字串的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。

trans-unit.source: A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: The text element enumerator is used only to read data in the string; it cannot modify the underlying string.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目列舉值是只能用來讀取字串; 中的資料它不能修改基礎字串。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the string.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值並沒有獨佔存取權的字串。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is in an invalid state if it is positioned before the first text element in the string or after the last text element in the string.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式會處於無效狀態，如果它位於第一個文字項目之前在字串或字串中的最後一個文字項目之後。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is in an invalid state, calling <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 處於無效狀態的列舉值時，呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first text element in the string.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在字串中的第一個文字項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after an enumerator is created or after <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called, <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> must be called to advance the enumerator to the first text element of the string before reading the value of <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建立列舉值之後或在之後<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>呼叫時，<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>列舉值前移至字串的第一個文字項目之前讀取的值必須呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 或 <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the end of the string is passed, the enumerator is again in an invalid state and calling <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 字串的末端後，列舉程式會一次無效的狀態和呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況，如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="str" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string to iterate through.
trans-unit.target: 要逐一查看的字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to start iterating.
trans-unit.target: 要從該處開始反覆查看之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the text elements of the string, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以從指定索引處開始來逐一查看字串文字項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator" /> for the string starting at <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 起始於 <paramref name="index" /> 之字串的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。

trans-unit.source: A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: The text element enumerator is used only to read data in the string; it cannot modify the underlying string.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目列舉值是只能用來讀取字串; 中的資料它不能修改基礎字串。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the string.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值並沒有獨佔存取權的字串。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is in an invalid state if it is positioned before the first text element in the string or after the last text element in the string.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式會處於無效狀態，如果它位於第一個文字項目之前在字串或字串中的最後一個文字項目之後。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is in an invalid state, calling <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 處於無效狀態的列舉值時，呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first text element in the string.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在字串中的第一個文字項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after an enumerator is created or after <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called, <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> must be called to advance the enumerator to the first text element of the string before reading the value of <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建立列舉值之後或在之後<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>呼叫時，<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>列舉值前移至字串的第一個文字項目之前讀取的值必須呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 或 <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the end of the string is passed, the enumerator is again in an invalid state and calling <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 字串的末端後，列舉程式會一次無效的狀態和呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況，如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TextElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="str" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="str" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 超出 <paramref name="str" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of text elements in the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中的文字元素數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of base characters, surrogate pairs, and combining character sequences in this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中的基底字元、Surrogate 字組及組合字元序列數目。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the indexes of each base character, high surrogate, or control character within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所指定字串內各個基底字元、高 Surrogate 或控制字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers that contains the zero-based indexes of each base character, high surrogate, or control character within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 整數陣列，包含所指定字串內各個基底字元、高 Surrogate 或控制字元的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。

trans-unit.source: A high surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+D800 through U+DBFF and a low surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+DC00 through U+DFFF.
trans-unit.target: 高 surrogate 是 Unicode 字碼指標 U + D800 到 U + DBFF 範圍內，且為低 surrogate Unicode 字碼指標 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 範圍中。

trans-unit.source: A control character is a character for which the Unicode value is U+007F or in the range U+0000 through U+001F or U+0080 through U+009F.
trans-unit.target: 控制字元是字元的 Unicode 值是 U + 007F 或 U + 0000 到 U + 001f 範圍或 U + 0080 到 U + 009F 範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。

trans-unit.source: A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: If a combining character sequence is invalid, every combining character in that sequence is also returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果組合無效的字元序列，該序列中的每個組合字元，也會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Each index in the resulting array is the beginning of a text element, that is, the index of the base character or the high surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 得到的陣列中每個索引都會開頭的文字項目，也就是基底字元或高 surrogate 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The length of each element is easily computed as the difference between successive indexes.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目的長度是輕鬆地計算後續索引之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: The length of the array will always be less than or equal to the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的長度一定會小於或等於字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: For example, given the string "\u4f00\u302a\ud800\udc00\u4f01", this method returns the indexes 0, 2, and 4.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設字串"\u4f00\u302a\ud800\udc00\u4f01"，這個方法會傳回索引 0、 2 和 4。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent Members
trans-unit.target: 對等成員

trans-unit.source: Starting in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A> method and <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.LengthInTextElements%2A> property provide an easy to use implementation of the functionality offered by the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 2.0 版開始<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A>方法和<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.LengthInTextElements%2A>屬性提供易於使用的實作所提供的功能<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="str" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: The string that is the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件值的字串。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object is instantiated, its <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A> property is set to one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>物件具現化，其<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A>屬性設定為下列值之一：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the default <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> 如果預設<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: You should then use the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A> property to assign the string that this <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo> object rperesents.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您應該使用<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.String%2A>屬性，以將字串指派這個<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo>rperesents 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The string supplied as the `value` argument to the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串提供`value`引數<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The value in a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定作業中的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件擷取文字項目的子字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of a text element in this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中文字項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object starting from a specified text element and continuing through the last text element.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中擷取文字項目的子字串，範圍從指定的文字項目開始，一直持續到最後一個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: A substring of text elements in this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object, starting from the text element index specified by the <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> parameter and continuing through the last text element in this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中的文字項目的子字串，範圍從 <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> 參數指定的文字項目索引開始，一直持續到這個物件中的最後一個文字項目。

trans-unit.source: Consider a string that consists of five text elements, indexed from 0 through 4.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮包含五個文字項目，從 0 到 4 編製索引的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the `startingTextElement` parameter is 1, the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A> method returns a substring that consists of the text elements for which the indexes are 1, 2, 3, and 4.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startingTextElement`參數設為 1，<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A>方法傳回的子字串，則索引是 1、 2、 3 和 4 的文字項目所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The string that is the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 做為目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件值的字串是空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of a text element in this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中文字項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of text elements to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的文字項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object starting from a specified text element and continuing through the specified number of text elements.
trans-unit.target: 在目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中擷取文字項目的子字串，範圍從指定的文字項目開始，一直持續到指定的文字項目數目。

trans-unit.source: A substring of text elements in this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中的文字項目的子字串。

trans-unit.source: The substring consists of the number of text elements specified by the <paramref name="lengthInTextElements" /> parameter and starts from the text element index specified by the <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 子字串由 <paramref name="lengthInTextElements" /> 參數所指定的文字項目數目所組成，而且從 <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> 參數所指定的文字項目索引開始。

trans-unit.source: Consider a string that consists of five text elements, indexed from 0 through 4.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮包含五個文字項目，從 0 到 4 編製索引的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the `startingTextElement` parameter is 1 and the `lengthInTextElements` parameter is 3, the <xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A> method returns a substring that consists of the text elements for which the indexes are 1, 2, and 3.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startingTextElement`參數是 1 和`lengthInTextElements`參數為 3，<xref:System.Globalization.StringInfo.SubstringByTextElements%2A>方法傳回的子字串，則索引是 1、 2 和 3 的文字項目所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startingTextElement" /> is greater than or equal to the length of the string that is the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> 大於或等於字串的長度，這個字串就是目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="lengthInTextElements" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengthInTextElements" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The string that is the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 做為目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件值的字串是空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="startingTextElement" /> + <paramref name="lengthInTextElements" /> specify an index that is greater than the number of text elements in this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startingTextElement" /> + <paramref name="lengthInTextElements" /> 指定一個索引，其大於這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.StringInfo" /> 物件中的文字項目數目。
